scripts.preh2o: cpr proxy dist/server --delete-first; BUNDLE_ENV=dev yarn tcm && yarn bundle:server
scripts.prestart: cpr static dist/server --delete-first; node scripts/dev-certs.js; yarn h2o
scripts.bundle: NODE_ENV=production yarn bundle:chrome & yarn bundle:safari & yarn bundle:edge & yarn bundle:firefox & yarn bundle:fallback & yarn bundle:server
scripts.bundle:chrome: BABEL_ENV=chrome node_modules/.bin/webpack-cli --config config/webpack.chrome.js --json > dist/chrome/webpack.json && node scripts/minify.js chrome false && node scripts/sw-generate.js && node scripts/minify.js chrome true
scripts.bundle:safari: BABEL_ENV=safari node_modules/.bin/webpack-cli --config config/webpack.safari.js --json > dist/safari/webpack.json && node scripts/minify.js safari
scripts.bundle:edge: BABEL_ENV=edge node_modules/.bin/webpack-cli --config config/webpack.edge.js --json > dist/edge/webpack.json && node scripts/minify.js edge
scripts.bundle:firefox: BABEL_ENV=firefox node_modules/.bin/webpack-cli --config config/webpack.firefox.js --json > dist/firefox/webpack.json && node scripts/minify.js firefox
scripts.bundle:fallback: BABEL_ENV=fallback node_modules/.bin/webpack-cli --config config/webpack.fallback.js --json > dist/fallback/webpack.json && node scripts/minify.js fallback
